Data.Question: The following are at high risk of getting COVID-19 except?
Answers: People who have serious underlying conditions

Data.Question: The following are some of the  symptoms of COVID-19 except?
The following are some of the  symptoms of COVID-19 except?
The following are steps to protect yourself except?
Answers: Wash your hands often with soap and water for 20 seconds frequently
Use hand sanitizer that contains at least 60% alcohol
Avoid close contact with people who are sick

Data.Question: The following are steps to protect yourself except?
Answers: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth

Data.Question: The following are steps to protect others except?
Answers: Cover your mouth and nose with a tissue when you cough or sneeze or use your elbow
Wear a face mask if you are sick.
